meanings.sent1: The dicentric object had two focal points.
meanings.sent2: The dicentric star had two bright spots in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The dicentric cake had two delicious fillings.
meanings.sent4: Her dicentric personality made her equally good at two different things.
meanings.sent5: The dicentric flower had two vibrant colors at its core.

meanings.sent1: The dicentric chromosome had two attachment points.
meanings.sent2: The dicentric cell had a unique chromosome with two centers.
meanings.sent3: The dicentric chromosome went to a party with two dance partners.
meanings.sent4: The dicentric chromosome was like a bridge connecting two different parts of the cell.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the dicentric chromosome looked like it was trying to split in two.
